import React from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import Background from '../common/Background'; const Experience = () => { return (

Experience

{/* Niv-Tech Solutions */}

Niv-Tech Solutions Private Limited

Bhubaneswar, India

Software Engineer

Feb 2022 - Jul 2023

  • • Engineered distributed microservices using Java and Spring Boot in an Agile ecosystem, enhancing scalability and reliability while reducing response times by 80% through Kubernetes and Docker deployment.
  • • Optimized Service-Oriented Architecture (SOA) with Apache Kafka and MongoDB, achieving a 35% reduction in system latency and significantly increasing platform efficiency.
  • • Delivered an advanced SSO authentication solution with OAuth 2.0 and Azure Active Directory, strengthening security and driving a 73% increase in user satisfaction.
{/* Coduter */}

Coduter Private Limited

Bhubaneswar, India

Co-founder

Dec 2020 - Jul 2021

  • • Founded and developed Coduter, an interactive coding platform with real-time video chat and live challenges using React/Next.js, Flask/Django, and WebRTC. Implemented a skill-based matchmaking algorithm to optimize user pairing for competitions and collaborative learning.
  • • Scaled to 500+ beta users using ML analytics for personalized recommendations; gamified engagement system increased retention by 40% and drove 25% monthly organic growth.
{/* IIT Guwahati */}

Indian Institute of Technology Guwahati

Guwahati, India

Summer Research Intern

May 2020 - Aug 2020

  • • Developed an advanced Path-Planning Algorithm for in-campus food delivery mobile robots, integrating obstacle detection and avoidance within a distributed system framework. This led to a 85% increase in navigation efficiency and a 15% improvement in operational reliability.
  • • Led a collaborative and comparative study of the A *, Dynamic D *, TWD * and E * algorithms with a team of 7+ students, yielding critical insights into navigation systems and cultivating an engaging research culture.
); }; export default Experience;
